statements: SELECT * FROM fraud_detection
SELECT amount, customer_id FROM fraud_detection
SELECT transaction_date, amount, customer_id FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, amount FROM fraud_detection ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM fraud_detection
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM fraud_detection GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND is_fraud = FALSE ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM fraud_detection
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 4 AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM authorized_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM unauthorized_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE suspicious_reason = 'Fraud';
SELECT authorized_user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM authorized_transactions GROUP BY authorized_user_id;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM unauthorized_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM authorized_transactions WHERE authorized_user_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_transactions WHERE unauthorized_user_id = 200 AND transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY unauthorized_timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, unauthorized_user_id FROM unauthorized_transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500 AND unauthorized_user_id = 300 ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE suspicious_reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, authorized_user_id FROM authorized_transactions WHERE authorized_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY authorized_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'Credit Card Fraud';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT pattern_description, pattern_type FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'credit card fraud' ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance, account_type FROM accounts JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT transaction_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs JOIN transactions ON transaction_logs.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id WHERE is_fraud = TRUE ORDER BY log_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'debit';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'debit' AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;

SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, accounts.account_number, transactions.amount FROM users INNER JOIN accounts ON users.user_id = accounts.account_id INNER JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE transactions.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(token_id) AS num_tokens FROM auth_tokens GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_tokens > 5 ORDER BY num_tokens DESC;

SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, a.account_number, t.amount, f.fraud_status FROM users u JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.account_id JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id JOIN fraud_history f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.fraud_status = 'suspected';
